All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddPhotoActivity
    This class defines an Activity for opening the device camera to add photo.
    Avatar
    This class is used to create an avatar and avatar name for a given QR code
    CameraActivity
    The CameraActivity is responsible for scanning QR codes using user's device camera.
    GeoLocation
    This class defines a GeoLocation of the user which contains city, latitude and longitude of the user
    GeoLocationFragment
    This Class is used to create a dialog fragment which is used to add comment and geolocation of the scanned QR
    HomeActivity
    Class responsible for navigating to and between home, leaderboard, profile, camera, and maps fragments.
    HomeFragment
    Class that represents the fragment for the home page.
    ItemClickListener  
    LeaderBoardAdapter  
    LeaderBoardAdapter1  
    LeaderBoardAdapter2  
    LeaderboardFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    MainActivity
    MainActivity class.
    MapsFragment
    This class defines the google map and add a custom marker which points to the qr code scanned in user geolocation vicinity
    ProfileFragment
    Class that represents the fragment for the profile page.
    QR
    QR class represents a QR code and stores its content, hash value, score, and avatar.
    QRActivity
    QRActivity displays the scanned QR code image and a back button.
    QRDatabase
    This class is used to handle the Firebase Cloud Firestore database operations related to QR codes.
    QRDatabase.AdditionCallback
    The interface for the callback that is triggered when a QR code is successfully added to the database.
    QRDialogFragment
    Class is used to create the QRDialogFragment which shows information about the QRmarker clicked on the map
    QRFragment
    Class is used to create QRFragment which ask the user to add photo for QRcode.
    RegisterActivity
    Class responsible for registering a new user
    User
    The User class represents a user in the QR Quest game.
    UserDatabase
    This class is used to handle the Firebase Cloud Firestore database operations related to Users It allows to add and query Users, as well as to check if a specific User already exists in the database and QR codes scanned by them.
    UserDatabase.RegistrationCallback
    The interface for the callback method to be called when user registration is successful.
    UserDatabase.UserExistsCallback
    The interface for the callback method to be called when checking if a user exists in the database.
    Wallet
    The Wallet class represents a wallet item containing a string identifier d, name and points.
    WalletAdapter
    An adapter class for binding an array of wallet objects to a RecyclerView.
